title: Acceleration of block on rough incline

content.question: A block of mass <math alttext="m" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>m</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is sliding down an inclined plane that makes an angle <math alttext="theta" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>θ</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> with the horizontal, as shown in the figure. The coefficient of kinetic friction between the surface and the block is <math alttext="mu" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>μ</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> . Which of the following is a correct expression for the acceleration <math alttext="a" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>a</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> of the block?

choices.label: <math alttext="g times, open parenthesis, 1 minus mu cosine theta, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>g</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mi>μ</mi><mi>cos</mi><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="g times, open parenthesis, sine theta minus mu cosine theta, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>g</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mi>θ</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>μ</mi><mi>cos</mi><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="g times, open parenthesis, 1 plus mu cosine theta, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>g</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>μ</mi><mi>cos</mi><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="g times, open parenthesis, sine theta plus mu cosine theta, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>g</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mi>θ</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>μ</mi><mi>cos</mi><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="g times, open parenthesis, sine theta minus cosine theta, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>g</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mi>θ</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>cos</mi><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="g times, open parenthesis, sine theta minus mu cosine theta, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>g</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mi>θ</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>μ</mi><mi>cos</mi><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
